ModMetaData.name: Hold the Grenades
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPonyta
ModMetaData.description:
"Fire at will" defaults to disabled when pawns are drafted if they are equipped with grenades or launchers.
These vanilla weapons are affected by this mod: - Frag grenades - EMP grenades - Molotov cocktails - Smoke launcher - Incendiary launcher - EMP launcher - Doomsday rocket launcher - Triple rocket launcher
Modded weapons whose projectile creates some kind of AoE explosion should also work.
